name: Astral Pirates
description:
WIP; due to technical and planning problems, this is not the finished version of the game. The team is working as hard as we can to fix these problems and give you the best experience possible.  

Aradia Kingsley-Jones: Design, Programming; Camera, Player movement and sprite animation for movement and combat

Alex Louch-up2111064: Artist, Design, Concept

Michael Beresford-up2120939: Programmer, Animation

Seamus Fitzgerald-up2102080: Level Design, Concept, Environmental Design and 3d Modelling

Alex Walton-up2150645: Producer, Concept, Artist

Owen Wiseman - up2120075: Programmer
